entry.title: [BIP Draft] Allow zero value OP_RETURN in Payment Protocol
entry.summary: In this conversation, Toby Padilla and Luke are discussing the use of coins being burned in the Bitcoin network. While Toby believes that there is a better alternative to burning coins, Luke disagrees and thinks that burning coins is better than it being gratis. They also discuss the need for a key to redeem inputs and how BIP70 allows for transactions to be constructed on another machine without requiring a key during construction. Luke sees this as a positive because it prevents spam from being made easier or cheaper. Ultimately, the conversation highlights differing perspectives on the use of coins in the Bitcoin network.
